mapper.select: select id, main_order_no, trip_order_no, trip_serial, index_no, order_type, pay_status, order_status, travel_flag, ticket_unit_price, ticket_total_price, service_unit_price, service_total_price, supplier_id, union_pay, with_hold_status, with_hold_fail_reason, apply_place_time, place_callback_time, apply_issue_time, issue_time, reject_apply_remark, extend_content, create_date, create_user, update_date, update_user from union_order.trip_order_info where id = #{id}

select id, main_order_no, trip_order_no, trip_serial, index_no, order_type, pay_status, order_status, travel_flag, ticket_unit_price, ticket_total_price, service_unit_price, service_total_price, supplier_id, union_pay, with_hold_status, with_hold_fail_reason, apply_place_time, place_callback_time, apply_issue_time, issue_time, reject_apply_remark, extend_content, create_date, create_user, update_date, update_user from union_order.trip_order_info limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into union_order.trip_order_info(main_order_no, trip_order_no, trip_serial, index_no, order_type, pay_status, order_status, travel_flag, ticket_unit_price, ticket_total_price, service_unit_price, service_total_price, supplier_id, union_pay, with_hold_status, with_hold_fail_reason, apply_place_time, place_callback_time, apply_issue_time, issue_time, reject_apply_remark, extend_content, create_date, create_user, update_date, update_user) values (#{mainOrderNo}, #{tripOrderNo}, #{tripSerial}, #{indexNo}, #{orderType}, #{payStatus}, #{orderStatus}, #{travelFlag}, #{ticketUnitPrice}, #{ticketTotalPrice}, #{serviceUnitPrice}, #{serviceTotalPrice}, #{supplierId}, #{unionPay}, #{withHoldStatus}, #{withHoldFailReason}, #{applyPlaceTime}, #{placeCallbackTime}, #{applyIssueTime}, #{issueTime}, #{rejectApplyRemark}, #{extendContent}, #{createDate}, #{createUser}, #{updateDate}, #{updateUser})
mapper.update:
update union_order.trip_order_info
main_order_no = #{mainOrderNo},
trip_order_no = #{tripOrderNo},
trip_serial = #{tripSerial},
index_no = #{indexNo},
order_type = #{orderType},
pay_status = #{payStatus},
order_status = #{orderStatus},
travel_flag = #{travelFlag},
ticket_unit_price = #{ticketUnitPrice},
ticket_total_price = #{ticketTotalPrice},
service_unit_price = #{serviceUnitPrice},
service_total_price = #{serviceTotalPrice},
supplier_id = #{supplierId},
union_pay = #{unionPay},
with_hold_status = #{withHoldStatus},
with_hold_fail_reason = #{withHoldFailReason},
apply_place_time = #{applyPlaceTime},
place_callback_time = #{placeCallbackTime},
apply_issue_time = #{applyIssueTime},
issue_time = #{issueTime},
reject_apply_remark = #{rejectApplyRemark},
extend_content = #{extendContent},
create_date = #{createDate},
create_user = #{createUser},
update_date = #{updateDate},
update_user = #{updateUser},
where id = #{id}
